title: Medieval Dungeon Adventure #36
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Torture Chamber
rooms.description: A grim stone chamber filled with rusted torture devices and chains hanging from the ceiling. The walls are stained with centuries of suffering. A single torch flickers, casting dancing shadows across iron maidens and stretching racks. The air is cold and damp, carrying the faint echo of past screams. Water drips steadily from cracks in the stone ceiling.

items.name: iron maiden
items.description: A tall iron torture device shaped like a sarcophagus with spikes inside

items.name: rusty dagger
items.description: A corroded dagger that could pry open weak locks

items.name: stretching rack
items.description: A wooden rack with chains and wheels used for extracting confessions

items.name: prisoner's note
items.description: A scrap of parchment hidden in the rack's mechanism
items.text: Day 89: They brought me to this cursed place built in 1347 by Lord Blackthorne. The warden, Sir Grimwald, keeps all records in the armory. I heard guards say the vault holds the castle's treasure and a secret passage to freedom. The combination to the executioner's box is the year this hell was built.

items.name: executioner's lockbox
items.description: A heavy iron box with a four-digit combination lock, covered in dried blood

items.name: brass key
items.description: A brass key engraved with the symbol of a sword and shield

items.name: execution log
items.description: A blood-stained ledger recording executions
items.text: EXECUTION RECORDS - Warden Sir Grimwald presiding. All condemned prisoners are held in the torture chamber before being taken to the gallows courtyard. Lord Blackthorne demands detailed records of all executions. Note: Vault access requires knowledge of the warden's name, the location of condemned prisoners, and the lord's title.

items.name: wall chains
items.description: Heavy chains bolted to the stone walls, still bearing manacles

items.name: interrogation table
items.description: A bloodstained wooden table with leather straps and a locked drawer

items.name: dungeon map
items.description: A crude map of the dungeon layout
items.text: MAP OF LORD BLACKTHORNE'S DUNGEON: Torture Chamber (lower level) connects to Guard's Armory (main level). The Castle Vault lies beyond the armory, protected by Lord Blackthorne's personal security. Only those who know the warden and the dungeon's secrets may enter.

items.name: heavy iron door
items.description: A reinforced iron door with a brass lock, leading to the guard's armory

rooms.name: Guard's Armory
rooms.description: A well-organized armory lined with weapon racks and armor stands. Swords, spears, and crossbows hang on the walls. A large wooden desk sits in the corner, covered with duty rosters and official documents. Shields bearing Lord Blackthorne's coat of arms are mounted above the doorway. The smell of oil and metal fills the air.

items.name: weapon rack
items.description: A rack holding various medieval weapons - swords, maces, and axes

items.name: silver key
items.description: A polished silver key with intricate engravings

items.name: guard captain's desk
items.description: A sturdy oak desk with multiple drawers and scattered papers

items.name: guard duty roster
items.description: A schedule of guard assignments and duties
items.text: GUARD DUTY ROSTER - All guards report to Warden Sir Grimwald. Morning shift: Patrol torture chamber and check condemned prisoners. Evening shift: Guard the vault entrance. Lord Blackthorne requires 666 gold pieces monthly for dungeon operations. Remember: Only knights and nobles are imprisoned in the high tower.

items.name: vault access instructions
items.description: Official instructions for accessing the castle vault
items.text: VAULT SECURITY PROTOCOL: To access Lord Blackthorne's vault, answer three security questions correctly. Q1: Who is the warden of this dungeon? Q2: Where are condemned prisoners held? Q3: What is your noble title? Only those of noble rank may access the treasure.

items.name: suit of armor
items.description: A complete set of plate armor on a wooden stand

items.name: letter from the warden
items.description: An official letter sealed with the warden's seal
items.text: From Warden Sir Grimwald to Lord Blackthorne: My lord, the dungeon operates efficiently. All condemned prisoners are secured in the torture chamber awaiting your judgment. The vault remains secure with your personal security questions. Your loyal servant, Sir Grimwald.

items.name: supply cabinet
items.description: A locked cabinet containing guard supplies and equipment

items.name: guard training manual
items.description: A manual for training new dungeon guards
items.text: GUARD TRAINING MANUAL: All guards serve under Warden Sir Grimwald in Lord Blackthorne's dungeon. Condemned prisoners are held in the torture chamber. Knights captured in battle are treated with respect according to their noble title. The vault contains Lord Blackthorne's wealth and a secret escape tunnel.

items.name: shield with coat of arms
items.description: A ceremonial shield bearing Lord Blackthorne's heraldry
items.text: The shield displays Lord Blackthorne's coat of arms: a black tower on a red field. Beneath it reads: 'Lord Blackthorne - Master of the Castle, Keeper of Justice.'

items.name: vault door
items.description: A massive reinforced door with elaborate locks and a security panel. Three questions are engraved on a brass plate.

password_questions.question: Who is the warden of this dungeon?
password_questions.hint: Check the execution log, duty roster, and warden's letter

password_questions.question: Where are condemned prisoners held?
password_questions.hint: Multiple documents mention where condemned prisoners are kept

password_questions.question: What is your noble title?
password_questions.hint: The guard manual mentions what title imprisoned nobles hold

rooms.name: Castle Vault
rooms.description: You've reached the castle vault! A magnificent chamber filled with chests overflowing with gold coins, jeweled crowns, and precious artifacts. Torches illuminate piles of treasure accumulated over generations. At the far end, a hidden passage has been revealed behind a moved tapestry - stone steps lead upward to daylight and freedom. Fresh air flows down from above, carrying the scent of the outside world.

items.name: chests of gold
items.description: Multiple wooden chests filled with gold coins, gems, and precious metals

items.name: royal crown
items.description: A magnificent crown encrusted with rubies, emeralds, and diamonds

items.name: golden chalice
items.description: An ornate chalice made of pure gold with intricate engravings

items.name: secret passage
items.description: A hidden stairway leading upward through the castle walls to freedom
items.text: Stone steps wind upward through a narrow passage. You can see daylight at the top and hear birds singing. Freedom awaits!

rooms.win_message: You've escaped the medieval dungeon and discovered Lord Blackthorne's treasure! As you climb the secret passage, you emerge in the forest outside the castle walls. The fresh air fills your lungs as you leave your imprisonment behind forever. With your newfound wealth and freedom, a new life awaits. You win!
